__TOC__

* Contact: <nowiki>[[k3lt01]]</nowiki>
* Make: Acer
* Brand: Extensa
* Model: 2300 (2304LCi)
* Website: I am unable to find an official Australian page for this machine anymore.
* The European website has sections for all extensa notebooks. For Acer Extensa 2300 see http://support.acer-euro.com/drivers/notebook/ex_3000.html as the 2300 and 3000 are basically the same machines. Please note they no longer supply an English version of the user manual.

=== Hardware details ===
==== Processor ====

* Intel Celeron M 1.3GHz. Options include: Intel Celeron M 320,330,340 and above; Intel Pentium M 705, 715,725,735,745,755.

==== Memory ====
* 256/512 MB DDR333 SDRAM (mine is 256 MB), upgradeable to 2048 MB.
* 512 KB flash ROM BIOS

==== Storage ====
* 30GB (mine was 40GB) and above E-IDE HDD (my laptop now has 250GB Western Digital HDD)
* CD-RW/DVD Drive
* 3-in-1 Card Reader option (mine is a poverty pack so I don't have this).

==== Display and Video ====
* TFT Display.
 - 14.1" XGA (1024x768).
 - 15.0" XGA (1024x768) or SXGA+ (1400x1050).
 - 15.4" WXGA (1280x800) or WSXGA+ (1680x1050.)
* ATI Mobility Radeon 9700 with 64 MB of video memory (option).
* Simultaneous LCD and CRT display support.
* Dual independent display

==== Networking  and Connectivity ====
* Intergrated 10/100/1000 Mbps Fast Ethernet (option).
* Conexant 56k Modem.
* LAN (Broadcom Ethernet NIC 4401 Gigabit Ethernet). 
* InviLink 802.11 b/g/ dual-band WLAN (Acer IPN2220 Wireless LAN Card).
* 3 USB 2.0 ports.
* Bluetooth (option, I don't have this)

==== Audio ====
* 16-bit AC'97 stereo.
* Dual speakers and 1 internal mic.
* Separate audio ports for headphone, line-in, mic.

==== Keyboard and mouse ====
* 88/89-key "Windows" keyboard.
* Touchpad device with scroll.

==== Original OS ====
* Acer derived Windows XP Home

=== Current Issues ===
* Everything works as it should except for the Euro key.
